Caption: Fig. 1. Our system consists of two parts: a sketch-based query and multiple coordinated views. a) The Flow Comparative View shows the variation of trafﬁc ﬂow of two directions over time. b) The Velocity-and-Distance view shows the relationship between a trip’s average speed and distance. c) The Flow-and-Velocity View shows the status of transportation distributed on a road. d) The Topology View shows the ratio of different ﬂow and is also used as a topology ﬁlter. e) The Flow Density View shows the density of trafﬁc ﬂow distributed on a road.
